sections.heading: CANCELLATIONArt. 3366. Cancellation upon written request; form and contentA
sections.text: The recorder of mortgages shall cancel, in whole or in part and in the manner prescribed by law, the recordation of a mortgage, pledge, or privilege upon receipt of a written request for cancellation in a form prescribed by
